nodes.text: Kor Gejalli was a planet located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. It was the throneworld of the Gejalli kajidic, until the Anjiliacs crushed the Gejallis during a clan war and took over their throneworld. The sole survivor of the Gejalli kajidic, Vago Gejalli Thokka, was adopted by Popara Anjiliac Diresto.
